de.nec.nle.siafu.model
Class RealOverlay

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.model.Overlay
      de.nec.nle.siafu.model.RealOverlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Overlayable
public class RealOverlay
extends Overlay

A real overlay does not perform any mapping between the matrix values and the returned value. This means that the return value of getValue is an IntegerNumber with the matrix value (or the pixel value for image generated overlays). The pixelvalue is the representation of the RGB values. In this sense, white which FFFFFFx0 yields a maximal pixel value and black, 000000x0 yields the minimum

Author:
Miquel Martin
